title: Taquita & Kaui
overview: MTV's reality series features Taquita & Kaui, two girls who met on MTV's hit series Making The Band 3. While they didn't make the final cut for Diddy's crew, Detroit native Taquita and Hawaiian-born Kaui have since become the best of friends. Now, after a year of saving their money, they're ready to take another shot at showbiz... in Las Vegas!
